FOUND IN: Jerez (the region famous for producing sherry)
Acres (1 acre = 43,560 square feet; to convert to yards, multiply by 9/10)
Must (a mixture of grape juice and skins)
Determination - The state of being determined to do something, implying a strong will or intention.
En masse - à la France ("En masse" means "all together" in French; "à la France" means "in the style of France")
Freebie (something that's free and not paid for)
